Spirit V2.5.7

What's changed from V2.5.6 (Boost V1.68.0) to V2.5.7 (Boost V1.69.0)
  • Drop own FP routines in favor of boost::math. GH#392 TRAC#13531
  • Missing visibility mark on exception types. GH#409
  • Fixed transform_attribute ambiguity. GH#407 GH#396
  • to_utf8: Fixed wchar_t handling on Windows. GH#413 GH#395
